Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Cerebrovascular Disorders/Intracranial Embolism and Thrombosis/Intracranial Thrombosis
Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Brain Diseases/Cerebrovascular Disorders/Intracranial Embolism and Thrombosis/Intracranial Thrombosis
Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Embolism and Thrombosis/Thromboembolism/Intracranial Embolism and Thrombosis/Intracranial Thrombosis
Record.Description: Formation or presence of a blood clot (THROMBUS) in a blood vessel within the SKULL. Intracranial thrombosis can lead to thrombotic occlusions and BRAIN INFARCTION. The majority of the thrombotic occlusions are associated with ATHEROSCLEROSIS.
